response.overview: Haitham, a handsome and elegant young man in his thirties, is known for his treatment of all women in a sophisticated manner that deserves the title of “gentleman,” and he does not hesitate to provide assistance to the fairer sex. However, this behavior will bring him many problems and put him in an unenviable position.  Haitham provides assistance to Al-Zohra, a young woman in her thirties who works as a tricycle driver, and who is not accustomed to being treated in this kind manner. Due to a misunderstanding and misunderstanding on her part, she realizes that his behavior is harassment, so she decides to follow him for a long distance. Instead of going to his home in Rabat to celebrate his wedding anniversary with his wife, Ilham, who is waiting for him in all her elegance, he finds himself being pursued by “Al-Zohra” in a far village near Casablanca.
response.title: جنتلمان
